overview: Five exquisite women share a mansion together in Beverly Hills, indulging in their most decadent fetishes and fantasies. Sometimes dominant and other times submissive, each woman reveals her innermost desires Stunning, naturally endowed beauties Dahlia Grey and Anita Blonde each appear in over twenty sumptuous body revealing erotic stylings. Andrew Black has created another visually unique tribute to the pleasures of the female form.
title: Possessions
